titles.title: O Jesus Christ Grow Thou In Me (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Each day let Thy supporting might My weakness still embrace My darkness vanish in Thy light Thy life my death efface{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus Christ grow Thou in me And all things else recede My heart be daily nearer Thee From sin be daily freed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Thy bright beams which on me fall Fade every evil thought That I am nothing Thou art all I would be daily taught{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More of Thy glory let me see Thou Holy Wise and True I would Thy living image be In joy and sorrow too{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fill me with gladness from above Hold me by strength divine Lord let the glow of Thy great love Through all my being shine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make this poor self grow less and less Be Thou my life and aim Oh make me daily through Thy grace More meet to bear Thy name{/lang-eng}
